column4: can anyone confirm that pidgin and yahoo are not working? or is it just me, I can't connect to yahoo.
You need to go to www.pidgin.im and update the PPA keys
That's not the newest version of pidgin
To update to version 2.6.2 you need to go to www.pidgin.im, copy and past the PPA keys into terminal, then go into the repo and click upgrade
